TopicTitle: South-West Launch Site - Kerbal Konstructs Content

Articles.Content:
**South-West Launch Site**

* * *

A small launch site located on the north island of Kerbin's own New Zealand.

Its look is inspired heavily by the [Woomera Test Range](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Woomera_Test_Range), From where in 1971 the British performed their first (and only) self-sufficient [orbital insertion of a satellite](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Black_Arrow#Launches) - [Prospero](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Prospero_%28satellite%29).

Its position permits only highly inclined or polar orbits.

[Download](https://www.dropbox.com/s/y45wv86b7c57jwo/TantaresLS.7z?dl=0)

![3348b678a5.jpg](http://puu.sh/jhyK4/3348b678a5.jpg)

> 
> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/eTjMr)

This is all a single 512x512 texture! Low memory footprint!

I've started the development thread to gain feedback on how to make the facility a little more believable.

Disclaimer, I am not a clever man - I have tried to research what components makes a launch site a launch site, but I am certain things have been missed.

**So!**

- Further buildings?
- Missing details?
- Incorrect Things (Launchpad placement)?
- The wrong location on Kerbin?

**Edited <time datetime="2016-12-22T21:03:38Z" title="12/22/2016 09:03  PM" data-short="7 yr">December 22, 2016</time> by Beale**

Cool! I'd be happy to test this!

It looks like a good launch site, but it could use a dirt runway next to it.
Nice! Congratz, Beale! I've been waiting for this for a while.
That's a very nice-looking launch site; well done!

Very nice! Maybe to have more detail, a ground thing with paths and shaped hexagonal like the bottoms in KSC? I don't really know how to describe them but they are pretty much the objects that act as the ground and have paths built in at the space center.

I suggest adding a giant warehouse to the mix. Also if there is any way to squeeze a window texture into your 512x512 texture (OMG SO SMALL!) I definitely suggest it to liven the place up.

All the launch sites that I see have an unrealistically small store house. ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

Not sure if it would look any better or not, but a chain link fence and some dirt roads are my only "suggestion" to make it look more realistic. But I am terrible at designing just about everything, so my suggestions should be taken lightly ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Looks awesome, we have something that resembles the Woomera Test range in Australia.

- - - Updated - - -

I just had an idea for the placement of the entire area:

Maybe you should move it to that other island to the west and then move the launch pad down to around the southern area of that island (just for more accuracy, since the island looks kinda like Australia).

Anyway, it is just a suggestion (maybe add another few launch pads just for decor, or even as actual launch pads appropriately designated with a 1, 2, 3, or 4 - I think).

I appreciate the attention to memory footprint. A ramp for rover access would be great, if it's not already available. Or the above mentioned false landscape to provide a smooth access to the facilities. Multiple launchpads would be awesome too. Finally I might have a good site for launching multiple rockets in formation using BurnTogether mod or something.
Wait that's all on a 512x512 texture? I'm impressed!

WHAOOOOOAAAHHHAOOOO!

Oh dear, excuse me.

This is so cool! I wish this could be the tier 0 space center!

Looks good, but try making it flush with the ground. Make "ground extension" like in stock KSC or Island airfield if the terrain is too rough. 

Also, more details! Pipes/doors/windows/fences etc. 

Making transitions from ground into wall look slike stock KSC, with a stripe with separate texture would be awesome as well. I guess you can reference Squad texture here.

The placement could be perhaps different I agree. But, I'm not so sure about pushing it further south (then it might become purely a place for polar launches).

>

Or the above mentioned false landscape to provide a smooth access to the facilities. Multiple launchpads would be awesome too. Finally I might have a good site for launching multiple rockets in formation using BurnTogether mod or something.

Thanks for feedback ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

There is already a small ramp on the rear (and hopefully will have a place to spawn a rover also).

![447cb4c0a8.jpg](http://puu.sh/jhSm7/447cb4c0a8.jpg)

Multiple launchpads may be very nice, if there is some believable way to reach each one from the VAB.

> 
> Wait that's all on a 512x512 texture? I'm impressed!

![56d26a5237.jpg](http://puu.sh/jhSgK/56d26a5237.jpg)

Thanks!

Well, there is another few (very small) supporting textures (such as the transparent criss-cross for the radio tower).

> 
> Looks good, but try making it flush with the ground. Make "ground extension" like in stock KSC or Island airfield if the terrain is too rough. 
> Also, more details! Pipes/doors/windows/fences etc. 
> 
> Making transitions from ground into wall look slike stock KSC, with a stripe with separate texture would be awesome as well. I guess you can reference Squad texture here.

Thanks for the feedback!

I think a ground extension would be a good way to go - but I have a slight paranoia of matching the surface textures exactly (so the launch site doesn't look out of place in surrounding terrain).

More details will be a good place to start I think ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

On transitions, it looks like this is achieved with transparent decals on the Bac9 developed stock buildings, I can try this!

![f9a602cec5.jpg](http://puu.sh/jhTkn/f9a602cec5.jpg)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-29T20:52:23Z" title="07/29/2015 08:52  PM" data-short="8 yr">July 29, 2015</time> by Beale**

Oh it looks as though you already have window textures! I definitely suggest you add a few more of them to the sides of the small buildings. You could probably make a rectangle with the window texture on a side and plop it all over the place. Definitely more windows ^-^. I also want to give you more cudos for the cell tower... It's beautiful. 

Really though! Add a gigantic warehouse! I'm envisioning a building shaped like this but huge:

![warehouse-exterior-concrete-locked-metal-door-31014472.jpg](http://thumbs.dreamstime.com/z/warehouse-exterior-concrete-locked-metal-door-31014472.jpg)

\*totally didn't steal that from google while on mobile\*
Is there a download? Looks cool.
As for decals: Due to Z-fighting problems they are not decals, but special polygons with separate texture. I remember reading an article about those KSC models.
I need a DL bruh. Please give it to me.
